desc: Neem soothes, moisturizes, and protect sensitive or irritated skin, treats acne, lice, and scabies, and protects pets and plants from pests. Shop for high quality neem products: Organic Pure Neem Oils, Neem Leaf, Neem Shampoo, Neem lotion, Neem cream, Neem toothpaste, Neem Soap, Neem mouthwash.
